Dashboard Purpose: Track implementation status of all 800-53 security controls
Key Metrics/KPIs: Control implementation status, Control effectiveness score, Open findings count, Remediation timeline
Primary Data Sources: GRC platform, Security assessment tools, Audit management system
Secondary Data Sources: CMDB, Ticketing system (Jira/ServiceNow), Document management system

Dashboard Purpose: Monitor application vulnerabilities and remediation progress
Key Metrics/KPIs: Critical/High/Medium/Low vulnerability counts, Mean Time to Remediate (MTTR), Vulnerability aging, Patch compliance rate
Primary Data Sources: Vulnerability scanners (Qualys, Tenable, Rapid7), Application security testing tools (SAST/DAST)
Secondary Data Sources: Asset management system, Change management system, Patch management tools

Dashboard Purpose: Monitor user access and privileged account management
Key Metrics/KPIs: Privileged account count, Access review completion rate, Failed login attempts, Inactive account count
Primary Data Sources: Identity and Access Management (IAM) systems, Active Directory, Cloud IAM (AWS IAM, Azure AD, GCP IAM)
Secondary Data Sources: SIEM logs, Authentication logs, HR system

Dashboard Purpose: Track incident detection and response effectiveness
Key Metrics/KPIs: Mean Time to Detect (MTTD), Mean Time to Respond (MTTR), Incident count by severity, Open incidents
Primary Data Sources: SIEM (Splunk, QRadar, Sentinel), Incident response platform, SOC ticketing system
Secondary Data Sources: EDR tools, Network monitoring tools, Threat intelligence feeds

Dashboard Purpose: Monitor ongoing security posture and compliance status
Key Metrics/KPIs: POA&M items open/closed, Scan coverage percentage, Critical findings aging, Monthly deliverable status
Primary Data Sources: Vulnerability scanners, Configuration management tools, FedRAMP automation tools
Secondary Data Sources: Asset inventory, Change management system, Evidence collection platform

Dashboard Purpose: Track FedRAMP authorization progress and maintenance
Key Metrics/KPIs: Authorization stage, Days to ATO, Control assessment status, 3PAO findings count
Primary Data Sources: FedRAMP project management tools, Assessment tracking system
Secondary Data Sources: Document repository, Communication logs, Stakeholder management system

Dashboard Purpose: Monitor security control testing and validation
Key Metrics/KPIs: Controls tested vs. total, Pass/fail rate, Residual risk score, Compensating controls count
Primary Data Sources: 3PAO assessment tools, Security testing platforms, Control validation system
Secondary Data Sources: Evidence repository, Test result database, Risk register

Dashboard Purpose: Track reportable incidents and notification timelines
Key Metrics/KPIs: Incidents reported to CISA, Time to report (72hr compliance), Incident severity distribution, Breach notification status
Primary Data Sources: Incident management platform, CISA reporting portal integration
Secondary Data Sources: SIEM, Forensics tools, Legal/compliance tracking

Dashboard Purpose: Monitor AI system risks and governance
Key Metrics/KPIs: AI systems inventory, Risk assessments completed, High-risk AI systems count, Governance review status
Primary Data Sources: AI governance platform, Model registry, Risk assessment tools
Secondary Data Sources: Data lineage tools, Model monitoring platforms, Ethics review board records

Dashboard Purpose: Track AI model behavior and safety metrics
Key Metrics/KPIs: Model accuracy drift, Bias detection alerts, Adversarial attack attempts, Safety incident count
Primary Data Sources: ML monitoring tools (MLflow, Weights & Biases), Model observability platforms
Secondary Data Sources: Application logs, User feedback systems, A/B testing platforms

Dashboard Purpose: Track implementation of CSF subcategories across all functions
Key Metrics/KPIs: Subcategories implemented, Maturity level by function, Gap analysis results, Target vs. current state
Primary Data Sources: GRC platform with CSF mapping, Assessment tools, Control framework database
Secondary Data Sources: Risk register, Policy management system, Training records

Dashboard Purpose: Maintain visibility of all organizational assets
Key Metrics/KPIs: Total asset count, Asset categorization, Unauthorized assets detected, Asset criticality distribution
Primary Data Sources: Asset discovery tools, CMDB, Cloud asset management (AWS Config, Azure Resource Graph)
Secondary Data Sources: Network scanners, Endpoint management, Cloud billing data

Dashboard Purpose: Monitor detection capabilities and response activities
Key Metrics/KPIs: Alerts generated, True positive rate, Detection coverage, Response SLA compliance
Primary Data Sources: SIEM, IDS/IPS, EDR platforms, SOAR tools
Secondary Data Sources: Network traffic analysis, Threat hunting tools, Incident response playbooks

Dashboard Purpose: Monitor security of systems handling payment card data
Key Metrics/KPIs: CDE asset inventory, Quarterly scan status, Penetration test findings, Segmentation validation
Primary Data Sources: PCI scanning vendors (ASV), Network segmentation tools, Payment application scanners
Secondary Data Sources: Firewall logs, Network diagrams, Data flow mapping tools

Dashboard Purpose: Monitor access to cardholder data
Key Metrics/KPIs: User access reviews completed, Multi-factor authentication coverage, Password policy compliance, Privileged access monitoring
Primary Data Sources: IAM systems, MFA solutions, Privileged access management (PAM)
Secondary Data Sources: Authentication logs, HR system, Access request system

Dashboard Purpose: Track network security controls and monitoring
Key Metrics/KPIs: Firewall rule reviews, IDS/IPS alerts, Network segmentation tests, Wireless security scans
Primary Data Sources: Firewall management systems, IDS/IPS, Network monitoring tools
Secondary Data Sources: SIEM, Network access control (NAC), Wireless security scanners

Dashboard Purpose: Monitor access to Protected Health Information
Key Metrics/KPIs: PHI access logs reviewed, Unauthorized access attempts, Audit log completeness, User activity anomalies
Primary Data Sources: Healthcare IT systems, EHR audit logs, Database activity monitoring
Secondary Data Sources: SIEM, User behavior analytics, Access governance tools

Dashboard Purpose: Track HIPAA risk assessments and mitigation
Key Metrics/KPIs: Risk assessments completed, High risks identified, Mitigation plan status, Security incidents
Primary Data Sources: Risk management platform, HIPAA compliance software
Secondary Data Sources: Vulnerability scanners, Threat assessment tools, Incident tracking

Dashboard Purpose: Monitor potential breaches and notification requirements
Key Metrics/KPIs: Potential breaches under investigation, Breach notification timeline, Affected individuals count, HHS reporting status
Primary Data Sources: Breach management system, Legal case management
Secondary Data Sources: Incident response platform, Forensics tools, Communication tracking

Dashboard Purpose: Monitor security controls across all TSC categories
Key Metrics/KPIs: Control effectiveness by category, Testing results, Exceptions identified, Remediation status
Primary Data Sources: SOC 2 compliance platform, Control testing tools
Secondary Data Sources: Evidence collection system, Policy management, Vendor risk management

Dashboard Purpose: Track system availability and data processing accuracy
Key Metrics/KPIs: System uptime percentage, Incident impact on availability, Processing error rate, Backup success rate
Primary Data Sources: Monitoring tools (Datadog, New Relic), Application performance monitoring, Backup systems
Secondary Data Sources: Incident management, Change management, Capacity planning tools

Dashboard Purpose: Monitor protection of confidential and private data
Key Metrics/KPIs: Data classification compliance, Encryption coverage, Privacy policy adherence, Data subject requests
Primary Data Sources: Data loss prevention (DLP), Encryption management, Privacy management platform
Secondary Data Sources: Data discovery tools, Access logs, Consent management

Dashboard Purpose: Monitor Information Security Management System effectiveness
Key Metrics/KPIs: ISMS objectives achievement, Nonconformities count, Corrective actions status, Management review findings
Primary Data Sources: ISMS software platform, Internal audit tools, Nonconformity tracking
Secondary Data Sources: Document management, Training management, Supplier management

Dashboard Purpose: Track information assets and configuration baselines
Key Metrics/KPIs: Information asset inventory, Configuration baseline compliance, Unauthorized changes detected, Asset classification
Primary Data Sources: CMDB, Configuration management tools, Asset management system
Secondary Data Sources: Change management, Version control, Cloud configuration tools

Dashboard Purpose: Monitor and respond to security incidents
Key Metrics/KPIs: Incidents by category, Time to containment, Lessons learned documented, Recurring incident patterns
Primary Data Sources: Incident management system, SIEM, Ticketing system
Secondary Data Sources: Forensics tools, Communication platform, Knowledge base

Dashboard Purpose: Monitor implementation of CCCS baseline controls
Key Metrics/KPIs: Control implementation percentage, Assessment findings, Remediation progress, Compliance score
Primary Data Sources: Security assessment tools, GRC platform
Secondary Data Sources: CMDB, Risk management system, Audit logs

Dashboard Purpose: Monitor compliance with privacy requirements
Key Metrics/KPIs: Consent management status, Data subject requests processed, Privacy breach incidents, Data retention compliance
Primary Data Sources: Privacy management platform, Consent management system
Secondary Data Sources: DLP tools, Data mapping tools, Legal case management

Dashboard Purpose: Track CyberSecure Canada certification requirements
Key Metrics/KPIs: Controls implemented, Security awareness training completion, Incident response plan status, Vulnerability management
Primary Data Sources: Certification tracking platform, Training management system
Secondary Data Sources: Vulnerability scanners, Policy management, Backup verification

Dashboard Purpose: Monitor LGPD data protection requirements
Key Metrics/KPIs: Data processing activities mapped, Consent records, Data subject rights requests, DPO activities
Primary Data Sources: LGPD compliance software, Data mapping tools, Consent management
Secondary Data Sources: DLP, Privacy impact assessments, Vendor management

Dashboard Purpose: Track technical and organizational security measures
Key Metrics/KPIs: Encryption implementation, Access controls, Security incident response, Data minimization compliance
Primary Data Sources: Security controls platform, Encryption management
Secondary Data Sources: Access governance, Incident response, Data lifecycle management

Dashboard Purpose: Monitor personal data handling compliance
Key Metrics/KPIs: Privacy notices published, Data transfers documented, Rights requests fulfilled, Security measures implemented
Primary Data Sources: Privacy management platform, Data governance tools
Secondary Data Sources: Legal compliance system, Vendor contracts, Audit trails

Dashboard Purpose: Monitor compliance with Singapore Cybersecurity Act
Key Metrics/KPIs: CII designation status, Cybersecurity audits completed, Incident reporting compliance, Risk assessment status
Primary Data Sources: CSA compliance platform, Audit management system
Secondary Data Sources: Risk assessment tools, Incident reporting portal, Asset inventory

Dashboard Purpose: Track reportable cybersecurity incidents
Key Metrics/KPIs: Incidents reported to CSA, Reporting timeline compliance, Incident severity classification, Resolution status
Primary Data Sources: Incident management platform, CSA reporting integration
Secondary Data Sources: SIEM, Forensics tools, Communication logs

Dashboard Purpose: Track maturity level across all eight mitigation strategies
Key Metrics/KPIs: Maturity level per strategy, Overall maturity score, Implementation gaps, Remediation timeline
Primary Data Sources: Essential Eight assessment tools, Security configuration management
Secondary Data Sources: Vulnerability scanners, Patch management, Application control tools

Dashboard Purpose: Monitor application control and patching effectiveness
Key Metrics/KPIs: Approved applications list, Unapproved applications detected, Patch compliance rate, Patching timeliness
Primary Data Sources: Application whitelisting tools, Patch management systems, Endpoint management
Secondary Data Sources: Software inventory, Vulnerability data, Change management

Dashboard Purpose: Track IRAP assessment findings and remediation
Key Metrics/KPIs: Assessment findings by severity, Remediation status, Control implementation, Re-assessment timeline
Primary Data Sources: IRAP assessment tools, Cloud security posture management
Secondary Data Sources: Cloud provider compliance reports, Security testing tools, Evidence repository

Dashboard Purpose: Monitor compliance with NZISM baseline controls
Key Metrics/KPIs: Control implementation status, Risk treatment plans, Security exceptions, Audit findings
Primary Data Sources: NZISM compliance tools, GRC platform
Secondary Data Sources: Cloud security tools, Risk register, Exception tracking

Dashboard Purpose: Monitor GDPR compliance across data processing activities
Key Metrics/KPIs: Data processing records (ROPA), DPIAs completed, Data subject requests, Breach notifications
Primary Data Sources: GDPR compliance platform, Data mapping tools, Privacy management software
Secondary Data Sources: DLP, Consent management, Vendor assessments

Dashboard Purpose: Track technical security measures and breach response
Key Metrics/KPIs: Encryption coverage, Pseudonymization implementation, Breach detection time, 72-hour notification compliance
Primary Data Sources: Security controls platform, Breach management system
Secondary Data Sources: Encryption tools, Incident response, Legal tracking

Dashboard Purpose: Monitor NIS2 cybersecurity requirements
Key Metrics/KPIs: Risk assessments completed, Security measures implemented, Supply chain risk management, Business continuity testing
Primary Data Sources: NIS2 compliance platform, Risk management tools
Secondary Data Sources: Vendor risk management, Business continuity tools, Security testing

Dashboard Purpose: Track NIS2 incident reporting obligations
Key Metrics/KPIs: Incidents reported (24hr early warning, 72hr notification), Significant incidents count, Response effectiveness, Lessons learned
Primary Data Sources: Incident management platform, NIS2 reporting portal integration
Secondary Data Sources: SIEM, Threat intelligence, Communication tools

Dashboard Purpose: Monitor operational resilience for financial entities
Key Metrics/KPIs: ICT risk management framework status, Resilience testing results, Third-party ICT risk, Major incident impact
Primary Data Sources: DORA compliance platform, Resilience testing tools
Secondary Data Sources: Business impact analysis, Vendor management, Incident tracking

Dashboard Purpose: Track ICT-related incidents and reporting
Key Metrics/KPIs: Major ICT incidents, Reporting to authorities, Root cause analysis, Recovery time
Primary Data Sources: Incident management system, Regulatory reporting tools
Secondary Data Sources: Service monitoring, Change management, Communication logs

Dashboard Purpose: Monitor CAF objectives and principles implementation
Key Metrics/KPIs: Objectives achieved by principle, Assessment findings, Improvement actions, Maturity progression
Primary Data Sources: CAF assessment tools, GRC platform
Secondary Data Sources: Risk management, Security controls, Governance documentation

Dashboard Purpose: Track security architecture and configuration management
Key Metrics/KPIs: Architecture reviews completed, Secure configuration baselines, Configuration drift detected, Vulnerability exposure
Primary Data Sources: Configuration management tools, Security architecture review tools
Secondary Data Sources: Cloud security posture management, Vulnerability scanners, Change control
Compliance Requirement Reference: NCSC CAF Principle B - Defending Systems

Dashboard Purpose: Monitor five key technical controls
Key Metrics/KPIs: Firewall configuration, Secure configuration, Access control, Malware protection, Patch management
Primary Data Sources: Cyber Essentials assessment tools, Endpoint security platforms
Secondary Data Sources: Firewall management, Patch systems, Access governance

Dashboard Purpose: Track cyber incidents and national reporting
Key Metrics/KPIs: Incidents reported to NCSC, Critical infrastructure incidents, Response coordination, Threat intelligence sharing
Primary Data Sources: National incident reporting portal, Incident management system
Secondary Data Sources: SIEM, Threat intelligence platform, Communication tools

Dashboard Purpose: Monitor OWASP Top 10 vulnerabilities in applications
Key Metrics/KPIs: Vulnerabilities by OWASP category, Critical web app vulnerabilities, Remediation rate, Secure coding compliance
Primary Data Sources: DAST tools (OWASP ZAP, Burp Suite), SAST tools, Web application firewalls
Secondary Data Sources: Code review tools, Developer training records, Penetration test results

Dashboard Purpose: Track implementation of 18 CIS Controls
Key Metrics/KPIs: Controls implemented by safeguard, Implementation groups coverage, Assessment score, Prioritization status
Primary Data Sources: CIS assessment tools, Security controls platform
Secondary Data Sources: Asset management, Configuration management, Vulnerability management

Dashboard Purpose: Monitor cloud security controls for STAR certification
Key Metrics/KPIs: CCM controls implemented, STAR level achieved, Assessment findings, Continuous monitoring status
Primary Data Sources: CSA STAR tools, Cloud security assessment platforms
Secondary Data Sources: Cloud provider compliance reports, Third-party audits, Control evidence

Dashboard Purpose: Track national cybersecurity capabilities across five pillars
Key Metrics/KPIs: Legal measures score, Technical measures score, Organizational measures, Capacity development, Cooperation
Primary Data Sources: National cybersecurity strategy documents, Legal framework database
Secondary Data Sources: Cybersecurity workforce data, International cooperation records, Technical capability assessments

Dashboard Purpose: Monitor alignment with WEF cybersecurity principles
Key Metrics/KPIs: Board oversight activities, Risk management integration, Stakeholder engagement, Resilience metrics
Primary Data Sources: Governance documentation, Board meeting records
Secondary Data Sources: Risk register, Stakeholder communication, Resilience testing results
Compliance Requirement Reference: WEF Principles for Board Governance of Cyber Risk
